originalText.text: The best! We've been using them for years for wash & fold and for dry cleaning, and they are always on time, follow instructions, and do a great job. Really sweet and friendly people—I love having them in the neighborhood.

text.text: The best! We've been using them for years for wash & fold and for dry cleaning, and they are always on time, follow instructions, and do a great job. Really sweet and friendly people—I love having them in the neighborhood.

originalText.text: I used Helen’s dry cleaning for some very delicate pieces, and regular soft jumpers and sweaters, 2 of which were brought back with a different texture that had pieces of fluff on it and one of which was a shirt which sequence work that was ruined and had pieces of thread coming out of it. I am very disappointed as this place was a recommendation and truly upset about my items.

originalText.text:
I've been living in this neighborhood, for 24 years. Let's just say, that I've been doing business with a bunch of places. But Helene's Cleaner warm, And customer's service do stand out.  Haven't being disappointed yet...
I don't expect to be, since I've been with the from opening  until now.
(10-2017)
All the very best to them...

originalText.text: Helens is across the street from me which makes them super convenient. I drop my laundry off in the morning and pick it up that evening. My clothes come back smelling April fresh. The staff is very nice and always offer to bring my laundry to me, but I can't be THAT lazy can I?

originalText.text: thats my dads dry cleaners and not just because he's my dad but he is kind and very generous and never has lost anybodys clothe or disrespected a costumer and also his workers very kind too everybody that comes to the dry cleaner loves the service .
